cause.description:
Think of all the drive-thru restaurants, in all the world, and all the vehicles that spend countless minutes, all day, every day, idling away, spewing greenhouse gases into the atmosphere, contributing to global warming. It is our mission to: 1. Inform the world of the dangers of continuing on this path of destruction, and, 2. Have drive-thrus banned.
1. Reduced emissions from vehicles
2. Slow the rate of global warming
3. Preserve fossil fuels
cause.mission: Rid the world of fossil fuel wasting drive-thrus.
cause.name: Ban All Drive-Thrus
